charges.charge_description: 18:2252A.F and 2252A(b)(2) ACTIVITIES RELATING TO MATERIAL CONTAINING CHILD PORNOGRAPHY(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 200 months; the cost of incarceration fee is waived. Upon release from imprisonment, the Defendant shall be placed on Supervised Release for a term of 10 years with standard and special conditions. Mandatory drug testing imposed. The Defendant must provide the USPO advance notification of any computer(s), automated service(s), or connected device(s) that he will use during the term of Supervision. The Defendant shall participate in the computer internet monitoring program administered by the USPO. The Defendant is to enroll, attend, and participate in mental health intervention specifically designed for the treatment of sexual offenders as approved by the USPO. The Defendant shall not have deliberate contact with any child under 18 years of age unless approved by the Probation officer. The Defendant shall not loiter within 100 feet of school yards, playgrounds, arcades or other places primarily used by children under the age of 18. The Defendant shall register with the State Sex Offender Registration Agency in any state where the Defendant resides, is employed, carries on a vocation, or is a student, and shall provide proof of registration to the Probation officer. The Defendant is prohibited from possessing or downloading any child pornography as defined in 18 U.S.C. Section 2256. The Defendant shall submit to a search of Defendant's person, property, vehicle, place of residence or any other property under Defendants control, based upon reasonable suspicion, and permit confiscation of any evidence or contraband discovered. The Defendant is to submit to a Mental Health evaluation. If indicated by the evaluation, the Defendant shall participate in Mental Health treatment as approved by the USPO. The Defendant shall forfeit to the United States his interest in the property specifically set forth in Section VII of the Plea agreement. No fine. Defendant to pay $100.00 mandatory assessment, due immediately.

charges.charge_description: 18:2252A.F - ACTIVITIES RELATING TO MATERIAL CONTAINING CHILD PORNOGRAPHY
